The LORD reigneth; let the people tremble: he sitteth <FI>between<Fi> the cherubims; let the earth be moved.<RF>be moved: Heb. stagger<Rf>
The LORD <FI>is<Fi> great in Zion; and he <FI>is<Fi> high above all the people.
Let them praise thy great and terrible name; <FI>for<Fi> it <FI>is<Fi> holy.
The king's strength also loveth judgment; thou dost establish equity, thou executest judgment and righteousness in Jacob.

Moses and Aaron among his priests, and Samuel among them that call upon his name; they called upon the LORD, and he answered them.
He spake unto them in the cloudy pillar: they kept his testimonies, and the ordinance <FI>that<Fi> he gave them.
Thou answeredst them, O LORD our God: thou wast a God that forgavest them, though thou tookest vengeance of their inventions.
Exalt the LORD our God, and worship at his holy hill; for the LORD our God <FI>is<Fi> holy.<CM>
